snippet: A fourth successive 1-0 victory, this one over Southampton, sent Leicester to a 7-point lead in the Premier League on Sunday.
abstract: Leicester City defeats Southampton, 1-0; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: A fourth successive 1-0 victory, this one over Southampton, sent Leicester to a 7-point lead in the Premier League on Sunday.

headline.main: Leicester Closing on Premier League Title
